wikipedia_page.main: Simon Paul Collis,  (23 February 1956) is a former British ambassador to several Middle Eastern countries before retiring from diplomatic service in February 2020.

response: * Simon Collis (born 1956), Ambassador to Syria since 2007, and to Qatar from 2005–7. Currently the United Kingdom's Ambassador to Iraq.
